title: Room 26
description: Is it all in his head?There’s something to be said about the power of uncertainty and how it attaches itself to our deepest fears.Game designer Tibi and his girlfriend Mia are looking forward to spending some relaxing days at a cozy mountain cabin. Over their first night in room 26 Tibi experiences a sinister sighting which will change his life for the worse.Years later, he still obsesses about the event and decides to return to the cabin to investigate, in the hope that everything was just in his head.A whirlwind of disturbing happenings, an occult ritual, old gypsy Baba haunting his dreams and his lack of sleep make him question his own sanity.Every day he is left without an answer is another day his paranoia amplifies … unless he can locate the source of his living nightmare and lift the curse.Room 26 is a standalone Horror Suspense Novel set in the Balkans, mixing elements of occult, psychological thriller and murder mystery.
author: John          Black
